text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... El and Grass have been in<n>there for a while now. Do
you think<n>everything is okay?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Not sure. And the president's been in<n>device 01 running this
whole time...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf?
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff... puff... Hehe.Hehehaha! Heh...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh? Is President Rudolf... laughing in<n>there?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Whaddya mean, they're burning<n>everything? What's goin'
on?!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
The demon army targeted the<n>village's food reserves! I
wish we<n>could go back and save everyone, but<n>we'll
never make it in time!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
No. That may be true of you, or<n>werewolves, or perhaps
even<n>wyverns. However...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
We're Umamusume! We can cover<n>the distance. Let's go,
El! This is our<n>"Fantasy Debut"!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Haaaah!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
We're Umamusume, the fastest of all<n>life in Umanest. In the
blink of an eye,<n>we cross many miles, until...

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
They've come to meddle with our<n>plans?! Soldiers, slather
your arrows<n>with toxins and tranquilizers! We're<n>gonna
rain terror upon them!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
Did we get her?! Bwahaha! Just a<n>drop of that poison
could—

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text: What's this?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Not only are we fast, but we're also<n>extremely resilient.
Umamusume can<n>shrug off basic debuffs like poison<n>and
paralysis.

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text: Oh yeah? We'll see how resilientyou really are! Keep firing! Give 'emmore poison than they can shake!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Who's spinnin' the ground... Ack,<n>Grass! Grass?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear. Just because you're<n>resistant doesn't mean
you're<n>invincible.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Comforting Heal!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nice one! Now we're talkin'!

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
Heh. We'll just fight magic with<n>magic. Sink their ankles
into a mucky<n>quagmire! Mudfield!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Umamusume Skill—Wet Conditions ◎!

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
What?! Argh, you have left me with<n>no recourse but to cast
a time-reversal<n>spell!

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text: Reverse! Hands of the clock, turn<n>backward!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
A time-reversal skill? We don't have<n>anything to counter
that...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
(But Umamusume never give up! If<n>time is runnin'
counterclockwise, then<n>so will I!)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: (Umamusume Skill—Left-Handed ◎!)

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text: What?! They can gocounterclockwise?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hiyaaah! Shrieking Condor Wave!

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text: Gyaaaah!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Now apologize! And give back the<n>food you've stolen!

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
Heh heh heh, hahahaha! What a<n>shame! My lordship has
already taken<n>all your food supplies away! It seems<n>you
arrived too late.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
The demon lord was here?! We must<n>give chase and
capture that tyrant. No<n>one can outrun an Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
Hmph... It is no use. You will never<n>catch up to the demon
lord.

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
For my lordship is no mere man or<n>beast—but something
faster!

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text: So give up. I assume you can put two<n>and two together.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
What could be so fast that even<n>Umamusume can't catch
up? They'd<n>have to be faster than a wyvern to<n>start, so
that leaves fenrirs,<n>thunderdrakes, or...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: No, y-you can't mean...

text_block_list.name: Demon Army Officer
text_block_list.text:
Mwahaha. Finally figured it out, huh?<n>Yes, our new lord of
demons is<n>capable of running just as fast as<n>you.
Because our lordship is—

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf?
text_block_list.text: Heh, hehehe... Take thaaaat!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! The runner in device 01 is<n>talking again! But that
didn't sound<n>like President Rudolf...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Rice grains, in the bag! Now I've got<n>everything I need to
make some tasty<n>rice porridge! If Peter Piper picked a<n>
peck of pickled peppers, then I'll pick<n>a pretty plenty pound!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Isn't that Golshi?! She's definitely<n>not in there for a test
run. She's just<n>fooling around...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Knowing her, she's not justfooling around. She's probablycausing the system error herself.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Director, why don't we just kick her<n>out of there?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. If we fiddle with the machines<n>now, there's a chance
it'd only make<n>things worse! So...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Onwards! We must commit firmly to<n>the course we've set!
